passive1.name: Favor
passive1.effects: Nearby enemy minions, killed by any ally other than you, will sometimes drop a coin that can be picked up to either grant 50 or restore 6% missing mana (minimum 10). Gold coin can only drop if an allied champion is nearby. Cannon minions will drop a coin as long as you don't kill them.

active.name: Warding
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 3 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item. A player may only have 3  Stealth Wards or  Totem Wards on the map at one time.
